text: Just thought i would jump in here as we built this app that will help with image compressions as well  <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/seo/HubSpot-image-compression>

What you see in the SERPs will vary depending on what you type and the language you use, google will change the title and meta description to better help the user and expose content from you page that would help CTR, the process of gaining control of your description is long and probably not worth the effort, there is probably better ways to spend you time to help rankings and CTR form google organic
